data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 10000 and  Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 10015
data.actual_result: The Pop-up is offset while vibrating
data.expected_result: The channel pop-up isn't offset while the screen is vibrating or the pop-up closes
data.short_description: Channel Pop-up get's offset upon vibrate
data.steps_to_repro: - Use the discordapp (not browser) - Read all messages accros all discord servers - Right click a channel - Use alt-shift-⬆⬇ to vibrate the screen - EXTRA - instead of reading all messages, one can use ctrl + alt + shift + ⬆⬇ to vibrate the screen
